title: [1.7.10][SSP/SMP][L_RweI汉化][停更]超级英雄 Superhero |漫威英雄&DC英雄|
author: 1234lian
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1234lian 于 2020-3-4 19:30 编辑 
超级英雄 - Project Superhuman
                                                                                                           ——Minecraft世界，将刮起一场血腥风雨！


这个模组添加了许多DC漫画和漫威漫画里的超级英雄，漫威粉和DC粉不妨可以下载来玩~\(≧▽≦)/~啦啦啦






漫威漫画の超级英雄
惊奇女士：惊奇女士附带再生2和力量5的效果。按下“F”将你的右手变身麒麟臂，获得力量10的效果从而增加她的战斗力。按下“R”键她可以变成一张粉色的沙发(某篇漫画里讲述了这个能力,为什么?看名字就很猎奇了)。再按下Shift让她变回原形。











金刚狼：金刚狼大叔附带迅速1、跳跃提升2、和生命恢复4。按“F”切换他的利爪。原来攻击是14点血，利爪可以攻击27血。你必须空手才能伸出利爪；如果你伸出利爪后切换成其他物品会让你的利爪缩回去。



蜘蛛侠：蜘蛛侠附带速度3和跳跃提升8。普通攻击可造成20血。将蜘蛛网射击装备放进装饰品栏可以按“F”让他射♂出蜘蛛网。被蜘蛛网射中的敌人会被缠住，并且受到轻微的伤害。他能爬墙，只要走进墙，他就可以攀爬，仿佛他们是梯子。按下Shift让蜘蛛侠在爬墙时定住。当附近有怪物时，蜘蛛侠的天赋“蜘蛛感应”会让他感觉到附近有敌人。你会懂的。





夜行者：夜行者已经快1力量5,跳提高2。他有和蜘蛛侠一模一样的爬墙功能。按“F”可以让夜行者往你鼠标指针的方向瞬移(64格以内)。按“R”夜行者将拿出属于他的剑。前提是你把剑放在第一个快捷物品栏里。
--爬墙
←←瞬移效果，在原来的地方会散发出紫色颗粒效果。

绿巨人：绿巨人附带速度3、跳跃提升4、生命恢复4、防火,抗性提升4和生命提升7，并且他走路会像骑马的感觉一样，如果前面有方块，会自动跳上去，而且很快，你根本只需要管着走就行了。按”F“会让绿巨人瞬间爆炸(雾)，对附近生物造成伤害，离生物越近伤害越高。当你在空中按下Shift，你会极速像地面冲去，当碰撞地面时，瞬间爆炸(雾)，对爆炸范围内的生物造成伤害并炸灰。按R切换绿巨人的“超级跳，能让绿巨人跳得非常高。





暴风女神：普攻伤害7左右，可以飞行。按”F“召唤一道闪电雷击鼠标指针区域。按”R“可以让这个世界下雷阵雨，按”G“将让这些讨厌的天气消失。



超胆侠：普攻7左右。附带跳跃提升2。按”F“可以瞬间切换它的专属武器。前提是你得把他的专属武器放到第一个快捷物品栏里。你用超胆侠时，会有一个模糊的线条界面。这个在第一人称视角看不舒服。你可以通过配置文件关掉它。



DC漫画の超级英雄
火星猎人：火星猎人附带速度3、生命恢复4、抗性提升4、生命提升和飞行，攻击力也是DIAODIAO的。他飞行的速度比正常的创造飞行更快。按F可以切换隐身效果。按R可以穿墙，但只持续10秒。按下G可以发射激光，不过伤害并不高。










闪电侠：闪电侠附带速度3、急迫5、跳跃提升2、生命恢复1的效果。按F将切换他行走的速度。第一阶段，他可以比平常快25倍并且可以在水上行走。在第二阶段，比平常快50倍，也可以让他在水上行走，同时，碰到墙壁会让他吓得跳起来。在第三阶段，他比平常快99倍，并且还可以在水上行走，同时，碰到墙壁也会让他吓得跳起。闪电侠有个专属戒指。装到饰品栏第二格后，按下Shift一会儿会变回原来的模样（玩家），再按Shift一会儿会变回闪电侠。



丧钟：丧钟有速度1，急迫3、跳跃提升2、生命恢复1和抗性提升1的效果。丧钟拥有属于他的专属武器，可以通过右键发射出类似胖次的子弹(雾)，会造成伤害。

哈利奎恩(小丑女)：哈利奎恩附带速度1、力量1、跳跃提升2、再生1。她对毒免疫。按F将快速掏♂出她的大♂锤♂锤。但你必须将她的的大♂锤♂锤放到第一个快捷物品栏那。

神奇女侠：神奇女侠附带速度3、生命恢复1、抗性提升4、跳跃提升2、生命提升1和飞行效果，普攻一次是33左右。她飞的速度比正常的创造飞行更快。按下”F“将快速掏出她的大♂宝♂剑，前提是她的大♂宝♂剑在快捷物品栏的第一格。按R开关她的愤怒模式，迅速提高到速度5，力量28。你可以看她身上有套索，但是功能还没被开发出来，所以嘛...


金色先锋：附带速度1、力量15、跳跃提升2、抗性提升2。按下F可以让他丢出浅灰色的胖次(雾)并对击中的生物造成伤害。你可以将属于他的金色戒指放进饰品栏里，从而让他获得普通的飞行能力。


蓝甲虫：附带力量5，跳跃提升2。专属武器：一把BB枪(……)。按下F快速切换，前提是……(不用我说了吧)。按下Shift+右键可以切换BB枪的模式。一、鼓风模式：射出的子弹造成轻微伤害并击退生物。二、闪光模式：命中的生物造成5秒失明效果。




FAQ问：饰品栏在哪里打开？答：生存模式物品栏里有个圆圈，点击打开。
问：专属武器重要不？答：目前只有丧钟和蓝甲虫的专属武器是他们的本命，才能显出他们的攻击方式。其它英雄的专属武器只是个摆饰。
问：饰品重要不？答：对于蜘蛛侠，闪电侠这些需要饰品的英雄还是比较重要的。蜘蛛侠没有了蛛网发射器除了攻击力大就少了控制能力了。
问：专属武器为什么会消失？答：这还是一个BUG。作者设定不是该英雄的专属武器在背包里会消失。但是有时候明明就是他的专属武器却消失了。有待改进 = =

下载地址

提取码：kg4v 已停更！


更新日志(原帖)
v0.2:



Added point system. Killing mobs will sometimes produce points (similar to the way experience is dropped). These points can be saved up and used to buy Blind Bags.Added Blind Bags. When right-clicked, the Blind Bag is opened and an armor piece is given to the player. There are 5 tiers of Blind Bags, with each having a different tier of armor pieces. Strong characters, such as Hulk, are Tier 5. Weaker characters, such as Daredevil, are Tier 1. Currently, Blind Bags are a drop from mobs and can be found as dungeon loot.Added Point Pool block. As you open Blind Bags you will end up with duplicate pieces of armor. Those pieces could be traded to other players or you can toss them in the point pool. This will break down armor and turn it into points, equivalent to its tier. This block isn’t obtainable in survival yet.
NEW CHARACTERS

Potion effects are not listed since those can be easily viewed.











Added Martian Manhunter








Can fly faster than creative.










Can toggle invisibility by pressing F.Can become intangible (move through blocks) for 10 seconds by pressing R.








Sneaking while intangible will allow the player to move through the floor if there is somewhere for them to go.












Can use Martian Vision (eye beams) by pressing G.










Added The Flash (Barry Allen)








Has variable super speed. Pressing F will cycle through speed levels (0-3)


















At speed 0, Swiftness level is 3.










At speed 1, Swiftness level is 25. Gains the ability to run across water.At speed 2, Swiftness level is 50. Gains the ability to run up walls. You have to jump onto the wall for this to work.At speed 3, Swiftness level is 99.










The Flash’s ring can be found in Blind Bags. Putting this ring in the first Baubles ring slot will allow the suit to quickly be equipped or removed by sneaking and pressing R.










Added Deathstroke








Pressing F will equip his Bo Staff. You must have the first inventory slot selected for this to work.










Pressing R will equip his Broad Sword. You must have the first inventory slot selected for this to work.Pressing G will have a chance of applying Slowness, Mining Fatigue, or Weakness to nearby entities.










Added Harley Quinn








Pressing F will equip her Mallet. You must have the first inventory slot selected for this to work.










She is immune to Poison.










Added Wonder Woman








Can fly faster than creative.










Pressing F will equip her Sword. You must have the first inventory slot selected for this to work.Pressing R toggles “Rage Mode”. When in “Rage Mode, she is faster and more powerful.










Added Booster Gold








Pressing F will fire a Force Bolt that does damage and knocks the hit entity back.










Added Legion Flight Ring which allows the wearer to fly. Can be found in Blind bags.










Added Blue Beetle (Ted Kord)








Pressing F will equip his BB Gun. You must have the first inventory slot selected for this to work.


















The BB Gun has two modes. Holding sneak and right-clicking will switch between the two modes. The first mode is Air Blast Mode. In this mode, hit entities will take minor damage and be knocked back greatly. The second mode is Flare Mode. In this mode, hit entities will receive a special kind of blindness for 5 seconds.



CHANGES TO EXISTING CHARACTERS

Potion effects are not listed since those can be easily viewed.











Ms. Marvel








Moved her couch transforming ability to R.










Pressing F will now make her right fist grow which increases her power.










Wolverine








Wolverine now has better Regeneration.












Spider-Man








Spider-Man can now stick to walls by sneaking when climbing a wall.










Spider-Man now has 10 different costumes that can be changed by pressing 1 on the Number Pad.








Added costumes are Symbiote (Black suit), Big Time, Sensational, Future Foundation, Iron Spider, Classic, Superior, Scarlet (Riley), and Scarlet (Kaine).










Symbiote and Iron Spider increase Strength.Iron Spider has Resistance and allows gliding if sneak is held while in the air.










Added Spider-Sense that activates when hostile mobs are nearby.The Web Shooter is temporarily a drop from Blind Bags and web is infinite for the moment.










Nightcrawler








Pressing R will spawn in Nightcrawler’s sword. You must have the first inventory slot selected for this to work.










Nightcrawler can now properly climb walls rather than just sticking to them.










Hulk








Added Swiftness, Regeneration, Resistance, Fire Resistance, and Step Assist potion effects.










Added toggle for the Super Jump by pressing R. When active, the Hulk will jump far even if the player is standing still.










Daredevil








Added Daredevil’s Billy Club which can be spawned in by pressing F. You must have the first inventory slot selected for this to work.


















Holding sneak and right-clicking will change the mode of the Billy Club. In the short mod, it does less damage but has a chance to stun hit enemies. In the long mod it does more damage.












The “blindness” overlay is no longer as bright as it was before.


Other under-the-hood work.Probably things I forgot.

注意事项
1.游戏中的点数暂时没有用途，作者会更新的——用来买套装。
2.感谢 @无敌_WaveXT 提供的一些注意事项！
为LZ提供点信息，自己发现的：
有的超级英雄的技能，不能装备饰品，不然用不了。
例子：
绿巨人装备飞行戒指，只能用跳+Shift，别的按键按了没反应
蜘蛛侠装备蛛丝发射器以外的饰品，会发射不了蜘蛛丝
也就是说装备了不是对应超级英雄的专属的饰品后就用不了技能了
还有，闪电侠的戒指经测试用不了
(请LZ在帖子里注明)
3.还是 @无敌_WaveXT 童鞋提供的~飞行戒指无论谁佩戴，降落时无论缓慢降落还是双击空格取消飞行，都会获得伤害，并且有可能瞬间死亡(缓慢降落也可能死= =)
不过闪电侠的戒指其实是可以用的啦=。=     前提是方法要正确，将他的戒指装进饰品栏~   WaveXT童鞋你怎么看~
   
 已经停更！
